ibeacon_major.docs:
**, int**: The iBeacon major identifier of the beacon that needs to be tracked. Usually used to group beacons, for example for grouping all beacons in the same building.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*

ibeacon_minor.docs:
**, int**: The iBeacon minor identifier of the beacon that needs to be tracked. Usually used to identify beacons within an iBeacon group.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*

ibeacon_uuid.docs:
**, string**: The [universally unique identifier](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier) to identify the beacon that needs to be tracked. Note that exactly one of `mac_address`, `irk`, `service_uuid` or `ibeacon_uuid` must be present.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*

irk.docs:
**, 16 byte hex string**: The Identity Resolving Key (IRK) to track for this sensor. Note that exactly one of `mac_address`, `irk`, `service_uuid` or `ibeacon_uuid` must be present.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*

mac_address.docs:
**, MAC Address**: The MAC address to track for this sensor. Note that exactly one of `mac_address`, `irk`, `service_uuid` or `ibeacon_uuid` must be present.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*

service_uuid.docs:
**, 16 bit, 32 bit, or 128 bit BLE Service UUID**: The BLE Service UUID which can be tracked if the device randomizes the MAC address. Note that exactly one of `mac_address`, `irk`, `service_uuid` or `ibeacon_uuid` must be present.

*See also: [ESP32 Bluetooth Low Energy RSSI Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ble_rssi.html#configuration-variables)*
